meanings.sent1: Dad will motorise his bicycle to make it faster.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic will motorise the boat for better performance.
meanings.sent3: I tried to motorise my shoes to run faster, but it didn't work!
meanings.sent4: She decided to motorise her skateboard and zoomed down the street.
meanings.sent5: The inventor's goal was to motorise everyday objects for convenience.

meanings.sent1: The factory will motorise their production line to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent2: They plan to motorise the old hand-cranked generator.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly suggested to motorise the toaster for quicker breakfasts.
meanings.sent4: The idea to motorise the manual pencil sharpener was a stroke of genius.
meanings.sent5: The team's innovative approach was to motorise the traditional farming tools.
